features: Dove mango butter beauty Bar This rich body soap is made with Mango butter and almond Butter to moisturize dry skin Give you a pampered spa-like experience every time you shower
Scented with lush mango and sweet almond, it's an everyday way to pamper yourself - and more luxurious than a standard bar Soap
Unlike traditional bar soaps, this beauty Bar contains 1/4 moisturizing cream to leave skin soft, supple and hydrated long after you towel off
Dove biodegradable soaps are gentle on Skin and the environment, making them a smart, responsible alternative to many bars of soap
Dove bath soap bars have been loved for generations. Now, the Mango butter and almond Butter beauty Bar comes in a luscious new scent
body.description: Dove Purely Pampering beauty bar with mango butter and almond Butter uses the rich moisture of mango butter to make every shower feel like a well-deserved treat. With the lush scent of juicy, ripe mango and sweet almond, This beauty bar Contains 1/4 moisturizing cream, so that it forms a luxurious lather and helps your skin to feel soft and hydrated every time you use it - for pampering that lasts long after you towel off. This biodegradable soap is gentle on your body and the environment, combining the cleansing power of bath soap with the skin-soothing properties of a beauty bar. At Dove, we believe bath time should give you a moment to relax, recharge and rejuvenate and our Mango butter beauty bar offers a fresh new alternative to African Black Soap, sandalwood soap, Shea butter Soap, Coconut soap and coconut oil soap, exfoliating soap and other bath soaps. Using this body soap leaves skin supple and moisturized long after showering - making it a wonderful way to add some self-care to your bath or shower routines. A tropical treat designed to be enjoyed every single day, This bath soap is sure to be a new favorite, and a welcome addition to your bath time collection. Dove has been recognized for its responsible and cruelty-free practices, and was added to the PETA Cruelty-Free list "beauty without bunnies." This body soap adheres to those strict standards too. This beauty bar goes great with Dove body wash mango and almond Butter and Dove skin care mango and almond Butter.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dove Beauty Bar To Moisturize Dry Skin With Mango Butter More Moisturizing Than Bar Soap Effectively washes away bacteria while nourishing your skin Dove Beauty Bar with mango butter and almond butter Juicy tropical mango and almond scent Made with ¼ moisturizing cream and retains skin’s moisture Leaves you with soft, smooth and glowing skinSulfate-free and made with gentle skin cleansers

About this product Longing for a vacation? Treat yourself to a taste of paradise with our Purely Pampering Mango Butter Beauty Bar. Its mouth-watering scent combines juicy mango with creamy almond butter to awaken your senses and surround you in a delightful tropical escape. Infused with the scents of rich mango butter and almond butter, it’ll help you take a moment to indulge your skin and give it the special care it deserves. Infused with our unique ¼ moisturizing cream too, the nourishing formula of this Dove Beauty Bar helps your skin retain more of its natural moisture. Plus, it’s made with mild skin cleansers that help skin retain its natural moisture, caring for skin as they clean. Blending classic care and a fruity scent, it leaves you with beautiful, glowing skin that’s soft, smooth and smells delicious.

reviews.reviewText: Good soap moisturizes very well.Nice scent.Its just fantastic soap.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price and product
reviews.reviewText: Nice, but smells like popcorn to me. I still like it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Your skin will be so soft and moisturized
reviews.reviewText: I love Dove Mango and Almond butter moisturizing bath bar soap, it leaves your skin so soft and the fragrance is very refreshing. I promise you that you will not be disappointed, please try it now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great smell & leaves skin moisturized and absolutely glowing. Nice! 😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Kinda smells like popcorn
reviews.reviewText: I love dove soap and buy it all the time. I tried this one because it was a scent I had never seen or smelled before so I thought I'd give it a try. Well it came today and it kinda smells like popcorn. Idk, maybe it would smell different when in use. I'm deciding if I should return or just keep it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love love love
reviews.reviewText: I’m not even joking when I tell you I have over 30 of these soaps at home.I love showering and rubbing it all over! The smell is just delicious and makes my skin very smooth

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was expecting something more fruity, but the scent smells cheesy to me. I still have a bunch of bars left. I'll use them when I am desperate.
